About Me

My journey...

BIO

My name is Mustafa Majeed and I am an aspiring software engineer based in Seattle, WA. Robots will eventually take over the world and Software Engineers will help them do it. That is the main reason why I have decided to leave the Kitchen and pursue my original dream. Watching my Basenji (Biko) chase Retrievers and Pitbulls at the dog park, along with coding obviously, are my favorite things to do.

Subsriber to the KISS Design Principle because: "Debugging is twice as hard as writing the code in the first place. Therefore, if you write the code as cleverly as possible, you are, by definition, not smart enough to debug it." - Brian W. Kernighan

    • Shokudo
